original_title: Inter School Rugby: Isipathana record bonus point win over Kingswood
original_body_lines: Isipathana College sent out a stern warning to the other title challengers with an emphatic 32 point to 8 win over Kingswood College at the Bogambara Stadium.
Isipathana held a 20-00 lead at half-time and they drove that advantage home in the second half.
West Indies all-rounder sustains facial fracture ahead of CWC Qualifier
